name: New Wave Burger
description:
We (FivePlusOne, a team of six) made this during Global Game Jam 2017. It's a simple game about making hamburgers, you can do it alone or with another person. The controls are simple, click to start the game, use keyboard to add ingredients, and serve the burger exactly as ordered.

Looking back, I could see a few ways to better present the challenge. See if you can spot them and let us know in the comments!

The lead programmer (myself) can be reached at @bitinn.

Source code can be found at GitHub.

新潮流汉堡

我们（五十一，一个6人小组）在全球游戏创作节2017制作了这款小游戏。内容不复杂，就是一个制作汉堡的小游戏。你可以一个人做，也可以两个人合作。操作很简单，点击开始游戏，键盘输入添加材料，献上和订单一样的汉堡。

现在回头看，我觉得游戏挑战的展现方式还是有不少可以修改的地方。如果你也发现了值得调整的点，请在留言中让我们知道！

你可以在推特上联系主程序开发，@bitinn（也就是我）。

源代码可以在GitHub找到。
